entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
